titleStmt.title: Mr. John Petrige's [sic], new prophesie of this present year 1684. Wherein are foretold themost considerable events and mutations in Great-Britain, France, Ireland, Holland, Germany, Italy, &c. According to the opinion of the best astrologers.
titleStmt.author: Partridge, John, 1644-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Reprinted by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
